text: Richard Samuel Kem (August 9, 1934 – April 1, 2016) was a United States Army major general who served as Commander, US Army Engineering Center and Fort Belvoir. He died after complications from hip surgery in 2016.http://www.legacy.com/obituaries/washingtonpost/obituary.aspx?pid=179526274 ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2016 deaths Category:People from Richmond, Indiana Category:United States Army generals
title: Richard S. Kem
